title: 2019 shop borders
body: Im just wondering, with the borders that cost 250 tokens, do you have to have that champion for the border to show? or is it for any champion you play?

replies.body:
You have to own and be playing the relevant champion *and* skin.

So for example, you will only see the Splendid Staff Nami border in loading if you are playing Nami with the Splendid Staff skin equipped.
